dt: {bc}marked by brief expression of a {a_link|comprehensive} matter {bc}concise and comprehensive

pt: {sc}concise{/sc} {sc}terse{/sc} {sc}succinct{/sc} {sc}laconic{/sc} {sc}summary{/sc} {sc}pithy{/sc} {sc}compendious{/sc} mean very brief in statement or expression. {sc}concise{/sc} suggests the removal of all that is superfluous or elaborative.
{sc}laconic{/sc} implies brevity to the point of seeming rude, indifferent, or mysterious.
{sc}summary{/sc} suggests the statement of main points with no elaboration or explanation.

pt.t: a {it}summary{/it} listing of the year's main events

pt: {sc}pithy{/sc} adds to {sc}succinct{/sc} or {sc}terse{/sc} the implication of richness of meaning or substance.
{sc}compendious{/sc} applies to what is at once full in scope and brief and concise in treatment.

shortdef: marked by brief expression of a comprehensive matter : concise and comprehensive; also : comprehensive
